title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Strengthening Programming Competencies Among Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Establishment of mobile-optimized content and real-time feedback systems in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze programming problems based on real-world work scenarios and propose structured solutions
Learners can apply object-oriented design principles to write modularized code and perform refactoring
Learners can explain the utilization of version control systems (Git) in collaborative environments and methods for constructing CI/CD pipelines
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
